values.text: Would you like me to transfer you to our representative?

For Online Order:  
->Please visit our official website
->Browse the website to find the chocolates
->Select the chocolates you want to buy
->Then place the order by completing the payment

For  Offline Order:
->Please visit our stores which are nearby your location .
*We have stores in London, Oslo, Paris, Berlin and Moscow
We accept all kinds of CREDIT CARDS, DEBIT CARDS and CASH ON DELIVERY.   For any further queries please contact us on +91124567520 or mail us on  info\@chocowheels.com
